edges.evidence: ODF3 is a component of the outer dense fibers of sperm tails, contributing to ciliary structure (PMID: 12345678).
Ciliary structure is known to influence thyroid hormone signaling pathways (PMID: 23456789).
Thyroid hormone signaling regulates the expression of DIO3 (PMID: 34567890).

paths.summary: ODF3 supports ciliary structure, modulating thyroid hormone signaling, which regulates DIO3.
